QuestData.Title: Falling Water
QuestData.Description:
I love waterfalls.
Want to know what's better than a waterfall?
Two waterfalls.
And the only thing better than that is... well, check out Three-Falls to the west of here and you'll see!
The innkeeper there is quite nice.
QuestData.LogDescription: Talk to Willa at Three-Falls Lookout in the Azure Span.
